# mixed-responses.json - LLM-Optimized Format
# Generated by jsonToLLMString function
# This shows how the JSON is transformed for better LLM comprehension
# 
# Key improvements:
# - Arrays as "LIST:" format instead of brackets
# - Semantic labels (Repository, Owner, FilePath, etc.)
# - Boolean values as "yes/no" instead of "true/false"
# - Eliminated JSON syntax noise (quotes, brackets, braces)
# - Zero data loss with enhanced readability
#
# ====================================================================

_comment: âš¡ Mixed API Responses Example
_description: This file contains a mixed collection of API responses that tests jsonToLLMString's ability to handle: (1) Success responses with complex data structures, (2) Error responses with detailed error objects and resolution steps, (3) Partial success responses with warning arrays, (4) Rate limiting errors with retry information, (5) Authentication errors with scope details, (6) File content responses with code samples, (7) Metadata objects with performance metrics. This represents real-world API batch processing where some calls succeed and others fail.
_test_cases: Tests error handling, warning arrays (warnings->LIST), mixed data types, status indicators, and complex nested success/failure patterns

    Cache_hit: no
  Item 4:
    Query_id: partial_success_with_warnings
    Status: partial_success
    Contents:
      File_contents:
        File: src/components/Button.tsx
        Size: 2048
        Content: import React from 'react';
import { styled } from 'styled-components';
import { ButtonProps, ButtonVariant, ButtonSize } from './types';

/**
 * A highly customizable button component with multiple variants and sizes
 * Supports theming, accessibility features, and loading states
 */
const StyledButton = styled.button<ButtonProps>`
  padding: ${props => {
    switch (props.size) {
      case 'small': return '8px 16px';
      case 'medium': return '12px 24px';
      case 'large': return '16px 32px';
      default: return '12px 24px';
    }
  }};
  
  background-color: ${props => {
    switch (props.variant) {
      case 'primary': return props.theme.colors.primary;
      case 'secondary': return props.theme.colors.secondary;
      case 'danger': return props.theme.colors.danger;
      default: return props.theme.colors.primary;
    }
  }};
  
  color: white;
  border: none;
  border-radius: ${props => props.theme.borderRadius};
  font-family: ${props => props.theme.fonts.primary};
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease-in-out;
  
  &:hover {
    opacity: 0.9;
    transform: translateY(-1px);
  }
  
  &:active {
    transform: translateY(0);
  }
  
  &:disabled {
    opacity: 0.5;
    cursor: not-allowed;
    transform: none;
  }
  
  ${props => props.loading && `
    position: relative;
    color: transparent;
    
    &::after {
      content: '';
      position: absolute;
      width: 16px;
      height: 16px;
      top: 50%;
      left: 50%;
      margin: -8px 0 0 -8px;
      border: 2px solid transparent;
      border-top: 2px solid currentColor;
      border-radius: 50%;
      animation: button-spin 1s linear infinite;
    }
    
    @keyframes button-spin {
      0% { transform: rotate(0deg); }
      100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }
    }
  `}
`;

export const Button: React.FC<ButtonProps> = ({
  children,
  variant = 'primary',
  size = 'medium',
  loading = false,
  disabled = false,
  onClick,
  ...props
}) => {
  return (
    <StyledButton
      variant={variant}
      size={size}
      loading={loading}
      disabled={disabled || loading}
      onClick={onClick}
      {...props}
    >
      {children}
    </StyledButton>
  );
};
        Encoding: utf-8

      Item 1:
        Type: deprecation_warning
        Message: The 'styled-components' import pattern used is deprecated
        Line: 2
        Suggestion: Use: import styled from 'styled-components'
      Item 2:
        Type: accessibility_warning
        Message: Button component should include aria-label when used with icons only
        Line: 67
        Suggestion: Add aria-label prop to ButtonProps interface
      Item 3:
        Type: performance_warning
        Message: Consider memoizing the styled component to prevent unnecessary re-renders
        Line: 9
        Suggestion: Wrap StyledButton with React.memo() or use useMemo for complex calculations

      Type: authentication_error
      Message: Invalid authentication credentials
      Code: 401
      Details:
        Authentication_method: token
        Token_type: personal_access_token
        Scopes_required: LIST: repo, read:user, read:org
        Scopes_provided: LIST: public_repo
        Missing_scopes: LIST: repo, read:user, read:org
      Resolution_steps: LIST: Check that your personal access token is valid and hasn't expired, Ensure your token has the required scopes: repo, read:user, read:org, Regenerate your token if necessary from GitHub Settings > Developer settings > Personal access tokens, Update your application configuration with the new token

> `npm install --save @types/react`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for React (https://react.dev/).

# Details
Files were exported from https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/react.

## Additional Details
 * Last updated: Mon, 11 Dec 2023 18:07:24 GMT
 * Dependencies: [@types/prop-types](https://npmjs.com/package/@types/prop-types), [@types/scheduler](https://npmjs.com/package/@types/scheduler), [csstype](https://npmjs.com/package/csstype)
 * Global values: none
